item.title: We ain't scared of no ghosts!
item.description: The last few weeks have seemed such a whirlwind - so this morning I sat down and actually began to reflect on them. I'm sure those of you who visit our sight are well aware of where we've come from and how we've progressed over the last ten months or so. Never in all my dreams back then of where this guild would go did I expect to be where I was last night - on the cutting edge of content. And what fun it is.

item.title: Tower of Sullon Zek!
item.description:
That's right, folks. Look what we did!
This update is short and sweet on the worlds and displays a few pictures of this zone we've stumbled across. Huge, huge kudo's to my guildmates for all their work figuring out and deciphering clues. What a great accomplishment guys!

item.title: EXCITING NEWS FROM ENLIGHTENMENT'S FRONT LINE
item.description: DO YOU KNOW WHAT THIS MEANS?!

item.title: How to Progress (Also known as How to Leech!)
item.description: It was no surprise to those outside of the guild that this event would occur:
